location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Assistant in Charge of the Residency, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter requests that Bruce furnish the woollens required by Sir Harford Jones from the warehouse. Includes an enclosure: a copy of a letter, dated 16 January 1811, from Robert Kitson, Import Warehouse Keeper, to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay. This letter has its own enclosure: a statement, dated 15 January 1811, of the remaining woollens ordered to be consigned to Sir Harford Jones.
